mapper.select: select tk_user_id,tk_user_name,tk_user_phone,tk_user_head from tk_user where tk_User_id in(SELECT tk_user_grade_id FROM `tk_user_grade` where `tk_user_grade_pid` = #{tkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select tk_user_id,tk_user_name,tk_user_phone,tk_user_head,tk_client_amount from tk_user where tk_User_id in(SELECT tk_user_grade_id FROM `tk_user_grade` where `tk_user_grade_pid` = #{tkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select tk_user_id,tk_user_name,tk_user_phone,tk_user_head,tk_client_amount from tk_user where tk_User_id in(SELECT tk_user_grade_id FROM `tk_user_grade` where `tk_user_grade_pid` = #{tkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by tk_client_amount desc
